name: Hentai15Puzzle02
description:
Hentai 15 Puzzle is a casual puzzle game. Rearrange the panels to complete the illustration!
You can check the completed image by right-clicking.
Complete the puzzle and get a high quality and sexy animation of a beautiful girl with Live2D!
The animation also has a voice!
You can view the images and animations you have obtained at any time in gallery mode.
There are multiple levels.
